title: Part of moving past these things
is reflecting on them.
body: [[This landscape is more than just a safe place for right now.]]

title: This landscape is more than just a safe place for right now.
body: [[It is a place that can be returned to any time.]]

title: It is a place that can be returned to any time.
body: [[It can be held within the mind and accessed whenever is needed.]]

title: It can be held within the mind and accessed whenever is needed.
body: [[Each of these objects is more than just a piece of the landscape.]]

title: Each of these objects is more than just a piece of the landscape.
They are tools.
body: [[They are helpers and teachers and they will tell stories.]]

title: They are helpers and teachers and they will tell stories.
body: [[Hopefully these stories inspire reflection, and help in looking back on difficult things, or events from the past,]]

title: Hopefully these stories inspire reflection, and help in looking back on difficult things, or events from the past,
body: [[and can be helpful in moving past them.]]

title: and can be helpful in moving past them.
Move using the joystick.
body: [[Press X near an object to ask it to tell you its story.]]

title: Press X near an object to ask it to tell you its story.
body: Try it with the cube in front of you.
